text: Bonang! Manyeloi a tla nka meea ea batho ba shoetseng sebeng, ke moo manyeloi a tla ba botsa a re: “le ne le le mathateng a joang?” ba tla re: “re ne re hateletsoe lefats’eng.” Joale e be manyeloi a re: “e be lefats’e la Allah le ne le se batsi hoo le ka beng le ile la falla tubehong e joalo?” Ruri ba na lehae la bona e tla ba lihele, pheletso e mpe Ruri ea leeto
